com.cyc.query

Interface ProofViewGenerator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    QueryAnswerExplanationGenerator<ProofView>

    public interface ProofViewGenerator
extends QueryAnswerExplanationGenerator<ProofView>
    Generates a ProofView for a specific answer to a query.

    • Method Summary
